title: Eliminate old phone numbers and centralize KVR Hospital contact details

requirements.summary: Remove any remaining old phone numbers from all frontend sources and ensure all tel: links target the correct numbers.
acceptanceCriteria: A full-text search of the frontend project (including frontend/index.html and all frontend/src/**/*.tsx files) returns zero matches for the old numbers: 08514-247365, 08514 247365, 9618158499, +91 9618158499.
All phone numbers rendered anywhere on the landing page (including bottom/below sections such as the footer/contact area) display only: 08514 220234 and 7207534210.
All call links use the correct tel: targets: tel:08514220234 and tel:7207534210.

file_operations.description: Verify there are no occurrences of old phone numbers in static HTML; if any are found, replace them with the correct display numbers (08514 220234, 7207534210) and ensure any tel: links use tel:08514220234 and tel:7207534210.

Scan for any hardcoded old phone numbers and replace with the correct numbers; ensure both call-to-action links use tel:08514220234 and tel:7207534210 and that only 08514 220234 and 7207534210 are displayed.

Scan for any hardcoded old phone numbers (including within descriptive paragraphs) and replace with the correct numbers; ensure any tel: links use tel:08514220234 and tel:7207534210 and that only 08514 220234 and 7207534210 are displayed.

requirements.summary: Create a single shared module for hospital contact details and refactor LandingPage, ContactSection, and Footer to use it (no hardcoded phone numbers/tel links).
acceptanceCriteria: There is a single source of truth in the frontend for both phone numbers and their tel: links.
LandingPage, ContactSection, and Footer no longer hardcode phone numbers directly in component JSX; they reference the shared constants instead.
After refactor, the UI output remains the same (still showing 08514 220234 and 7207534210), and all tel: links still dial the correct numbers.

file_operations.description: Add a shared, single source-of-truth export for hospital contact details: both phone display strings (08514 220234, 7207534210), their tel: link targets (tel:08514220234, tel:7207534210), and existing email/address values currently used by LandingPage, ContactSection, and Footer.

Refactor to import hospital contact constants and replace hardcoded phone numbers, tel: links, and other contact details (as applicable) with shared values while keeping user-facing text and layout unchanged.
